author: wsjcom
title: Why Would the Pope Trust China for Bishops?
text:
Your editorial “The Bishops of Xi Jinping” (Feb. 2) reports Pope Francis will soon sign an agreement with China that will “allow” the pope to appoint all bishops in China, but only from a candidate list chosen by the atheist communist government. That is organizational madness.
Consider a Catholic bishop’s powers: He ordains all priests, operates seminaries, elementary schools, high schools, colleges and universities, including all that is taught and who teaches it. He appoints leaders of all church organizations, interprets...
